definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-135" y="106"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Initializing Grimm's mod cache.</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_datamap"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:cache</field><value name="VAL"><block type="datamap_create"></block></value><next><block type="directory_files_foreach"><value name="directory"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/grimms/custom/</field></block></value></block></value><value name="_placeholder"><block type="string_iterator"></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="string_iterator"></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="procedure">InitCacheFile</field><field name="name0">filepath</field><value name="arg0"><block type="string_iterator"></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Done!</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
